p: Modeled EGU emissions of SO 2 increase by 17.2%, and NO X by 13.7%, due to building energy use in the future climate (state-by-state variation shown in Fig 5). This increase in EGU emissions results in increases in sulfate particulate matter (SO 4 2−, 5.8% as compared to MCCO, or 0.09 μg/m 3) and nitrate PM (NO 3 −, 3.1% as compared to MCCO, or 0.7 × 10 −3 μg/m 3).
